text: Her is git oþer wel god eaca.
La leof, a is swa betere, swa cristenra manna ma geornor to Criste sece his þearfe æt æghwilcere neode.
And do gehwa mid his scriftes geþeahte georne on godes est to gode, þæt he don mæge.
And andette his sinna unforwandodlice manna gehwilc swiðe gelomlice and bete swiðe georne, swa swa him man tæce, and ælces unrihtes þurh godes fultum georne geswice.
And clænsige his heortan gehwa fram æghwilcum niðgraman and hetelican yrre.
And, gif he hwam abulge, gebete þæt georne and girne to godes þeowum, þæt hy him siððanabsolutionemmacigan.
And þonne mæg he glædlice æfter þam gancgan to husle him silfum to þearfe.

And aa is swa betere manna gehwilcum, swa he oftor to ðam gearwige hine silfne, forðam þe hit is ealra læcedoma selost, þe æfre gewurde, þam, þe þæs geearniað, þæt he his afon mot him silfum to þearfe.
